snippet.title: Asphodelium - Dark Boys Love Visual Novel [Preview]
snippet.description:
Hazel is an ex-adventurer who's settled down with some of his previous guildmates after the adventure of a lifetime--taking down a doomsday cult that tried to end the world, but at the cost of killing their former guild leader who turned against them. Despite their adventure still haunting him months later, he's tried to move on.
That is until a man with the same face as their guild leader approaches him.

Play the full game on itchio: https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/asphodelium

We're a visual novel development studio, making fantasy romance games. Follow our development via our newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/4e122e9a1446/cgw-newsletter
